message: And I think admins of private groups should be able to make the list of members not visible to non-members
I think it's a problem that everyone can see from anyone's profile page which groups he / she is a member of.
@craigshipp the list of members, the number of topics and the number of posts are
@craigshipp sorry, I thought you meant that nothing in private groups is visible but rather I'm failing / looking at a non-private group :D but I guess you agree with me then..
So I'm suggesting: add checkboxes or something in the "memberships" section for hiding each group from the profile page
nothing in private groups should be visible to non-members.
@miikao IMO users are not going to trust that a group is private if it's not completely private. Just saying.

yes I might be in (or might want to be) in some shady groups with shady people. I don't think I'm the only one.. More importantly, what about people who live in countries where freedom of speech is suppressed and so on? (fortunately it's not that bad here.)
@miikao my private groups are all shady - isn't that the point of private to be shady :)

is that really a big deal if you a non-member can see how many topics, list of members and number of post? i mean if nothing that is said can't be seen then it is fine, you guys must have some really shady things to hide LOL
@miikao I feel if you need that much control then this isn't the platform for it
I wouldn't say that, we're listening to this feedback and we may offer something along these lines someday.
@miikao Thanks for letting us know about your feature request
@ericflo thanks and good to know you are considering it. I understand this isn't an issue for many people yet, but I'm pretty sure it will be once people start to use convore up to its full potential
